name: Jubjub Bird
description: The Jubjub Bird is a large beast with a high-pitched scream and strong physical abilities, primarily using its sharp beak to attack.
memorable: Its ability to intimidate with a high-pitched scream and its resilient nature due to poison immunity makes it a unique opponent.
goals: Typically driven by instinct, likely to defend its territory or food sources.
relations: May be found alongside other beasts but does not have known allies or masters.
environment: Commonly inhabits forested areas or regions where it can nest and hunt.
strengths: Resistant to poison damage and immune to poison status, allowing it to keep fighting effectively against certain attacks.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence limits its interactions and ability to solve problems.
attacks: Uses multiattack featuring a powerful bite and constricting grapple, with both attacks causing piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Shrill Screech, which enhances its intimidation capabilities in encounters.
skills: Possesses basic perception skills, allowing it to notice threats at a minimal level.
additional_information: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed.
Disadvantage on Wisdom checks made against it for animal handling.
Disadvantage to opportunity attacks made against it.
Ability to counterattack with Bite on missed attacks within 10 feet.
Significant physical damage potential with strong bites.
test_queries: large bird with a piercing scream
bird that can intimidate with screech
